errors.emptyInstruction: Please include some instructions for AI on what to update.
errors.noCurrentVersion: No current version set. Contact support or open a Github issue.
errors.invalidHistory: Version history is invalid. This shouldn't happen. Please contact support or open a Github issue.

messages.deprecationMessage: We no longer support this model. Instead, code generation will use GPT-4o or Claude Sonnet 3.5, the 2 state-of-the-art models.

onboardingNote.orUseKey: or use your own OpenAI API key with GPT4 vision access.
onboardingNote.followInstructions: Follow these instructions to get yourself a key.
onboardingNote.pasteKey: and paste it in the Settings dialog (gear icon above). Your key is only stored in your browser. Never stored on our servers.

picoBadge.openSourceProject: an open source project by Pico

recording.noDataError: Screen recording does not exist. Please try again.

sidebar.videoGenerationWarning: Code generation from videos can take 3-4 minutes. We do multiple passes to get the best result. Please be patient.
sidebar.updateInstructionPlaceholder: Tell the AI what to change...

editPopup.placeholder: Tell the AI what to change about this element...

setting.title: Settings
setting.dallePlaceholderDescription: More fun with it but if you want to save money, turn it off.
setting.apiKeyDescription: Only stored in your browser. Never stored on servers. Overrides your .env config.
setting.openAIBaseURLDescription: Replace with a proxy URL if you don't want to use the default.
setting.screenshotDescription: If you want to use URLs directly instead of taking the screenshot yourself, add a ScreenshotOne API key.
setting.codeEditorTheme: Code Editor Theme - requires page refresh to update

imageUpload.dragDropPrompt:
Drag & drop a screenshot here, 
 or click to upload
imageUpload.uploadPrompt: Upload a screen recording (.mp4, .mov) or record your screen to clone a whole app (experimental).

importCode.dialogDescription: Make sure that the code you're importing is valid HTML.

termsOfService.title: Enter your email to get started
termsOfService.consentText: By providing your email, you consent to receiving occasional product updates, and you accept the
termsOfService.localRunText: Prefer to run it yourself locally? This project is open source.
termsOfService.githubLink: Download the code and get started on Github.
termsOfService.usageText: Designers and engineers from these organizations use Screenshot to Code to build interfaces faster.

urlInput.errorNoApiKey: Please add a ScreenshotOne API key in the Settings dialog. This is optional - you can also drag/drop and upload images directly.
urlInput.errorCaptureDetails: Failed to capture screenshot. Look at the console and your backend logs for more details.
